title: 11.3 Distributed Management Task Force (DMTF) Security Protocol and Data Model (SPDM)

tables.title: Table_11_3_Distributed_Management_Task_Force_DMTF_Security_Protocol_and_Data_Model_SPDM
tables.table_md:
| Requirement ID | Description |
| :--- | :--- |
| SPDМ-1 | The device shall support firmware measurement and identity authentication per the DMTF SPDМ 1.1 or later specifications. |
| SPDМ-2 | The device shall support the PCI-SIG Component Measurement and Authentication (CMA) ECN. |
| SPDМ-3 | The device shall support SPDМ-1 and SPDМ-2 via MCTP over SMBus/I2C. |
| SPDМ-4 | The device shall support SPDМ-1 and SPDМ-2 via MCTP over PCIe VDM. |
| SPDМ-5 | The device shall support SPDМ-1 and SPDМ-2 via PCI-SIG Data Object Exchange (DOE). |
| SPDМ-6 | The leaf certificate shall include a Subject Alternative Name extension as defined in the CMA ECN. |
